intro.title: Systems Discovery
intro.p2: Explore how parts work together to create a whole.

b1.title: Closing the Loop
b1.prompt: Complete the cycle by activating steps in order.
b1.hint: Gentle hint: Kitchen -> Compost -> Soil -> Herbs.

b3.title: Waste Sorting
b3.prompt: Sort the items into the correct bins.
b3.hintDetail: Organic goes to green, plastic to blue, paper to yellow.

wrap.title: Systems Explored
wrap.done: You've successfully mapped the core systems.

outro.title: Discovery Complete
outro.p1: You have a better understanding of how these systems interact.

intro.title: Body Systems: Breath
intro.p1: Oxygen is the fuel for every cell in your body.

bb1.title: Oxygen Flow
bb1.prompt: Connect the airway to restore oxygen flow to the tissues.

bb2.title: Gas Exchange
bb2.prompt: Monitor homeostasis as gases move across membranes.

outro.title: Respiration Restored
outro.p1: The system is stable and oxygenating efficiently.

intro.title: Body Systems: Fuel
intro.p1: Nutrients must be broken down and transported.

bf1.title: Digestion
bf1.prompt: Break down complex molecules into simple fuel.

bf3.title: Storage
bf3.prompt: Manage energy reserves for future use.

outro.title: Fueling Complete
outro.p1: The body has the energy it needs to function.

intro.title: Body Systems: Move
intro.p1: Muscles and bones work in concert.

bm1.title: Contraction
bm1.prompt: Coordinate muscle fibers for precise movement.

bm2.title: Support
bm2.prompt: Leverage the skeletal structure for strength.

outro.title: Movement Mastered
outro.p1: The system is agile and responsive.

bsd1.title: Transmission
bsd1.prompt: Send electrical signals across neural pathways.

outro.title: Signals Clear
outro.p1: Communication is fast and the body is protected.

intro.title: Body Systems: Grow
intro.p1: Cells divide and specialize over time.

bg1.title: Mitosis
bg1.prompt: Guide cellular replication for growth and repair.

bg2.title: Differentiation
bg2.prompt: Specialized cells form tissues and organs.

outro.title: Growth Sustained
outro.p1: The system has developed according to its blueprint.
